sentences.sentence: Many Americans may know Kazakhstan from the 2006 movie Borat. The film erroneously painted the country as a far-off land that produces foul-mouthed goofballs like the star of the movie.
sentences.translation: 很多美国人可能在2006年就通过电影波拉特认识哈萨克斯坦。这部电影错误的把这个国家描绘成一个专出如电影里的明星那样的满口脏话的傻瓜的遥远地方。
